response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value and significance. This unique item is worth more than $1,200,000 to me, encapsulating years of dedication and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth extends far beyond its monetary value, offering a multitude of possibilities for those who appreciate its uniqueness.

I am extending this exclusive offer to you for the purpose of sharing its potential and allowing you to explore its benefits. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,500,000. This price reflects not only its current market value but also the appreciation it could bring over time, making it a valuable investment for you.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it is tailored to recognize the importance of such a product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide you with all the details necessary to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
